attributes.action: Make transgender surgeries cheaper or on the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: Because being transgender is not a choice. The NHS pay for it when they think that someone needs it but when it isn’t the NHS making the decision and it’s the person making their own decision, they are blanked out and ignored and they have to pay thousands of pounds just to be themself.
attributes.background: Make the NHS pay for top and bottom surgeries and testosterone or make them all cheaper and more affordable for transgender people who aren’t as rich as others.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a clinical decision for the NHS.
